<<<<<<< HEAD
Pious remarkes upon the life of S. Joseph spouse of the B. Virgin Mary mother of our Lord Jesus Christ. Written originally in French by Rd. father Paul Barrie Barry, Paul de, 1587-1661.
The second edition of the English translation.
[10], 183, [1], p. : ill.
Printed by T.F., [S.l.] : in the year, M.DCC. [1700]
"Devotions to S. Joseph spouse" has separate dated title page; with separate pagination and register. Copy filmed at UMI microfilm Early English Books 1641-1700 reel 2470 bound and filmed with Wing B973aA. Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
=======
